name: The Will Of Arthur Flabbington (demo)
description:
If your will's uncle talks about a hidden treasure, prompting his two dearest friends to set aside their long-standing hatred and collaborate to recover it, you have two choices. Either you convince those two friends that forgiveness is the answer...

...or you're Jack Flabbington, and you ask a psychic to contact uncle Arthur's spirit for more information.

This is a point and click game. Use your mouse to control the character.
Left click: walk to, or perform the cursor action (look, take, talk, use)
Right click: look at hotspot
Inventory: left click to use, right click to look. Right click with a selected object will deselect it.

This demo game has been made in 14 days for AdventureX Jam 2021 following the theme Contact. The full game will be developed on a longer time window, follow Gugames on Twitter for updates!
